constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 每个分段的元素和严格递减，即对于所有 0 ≤ i < m-1，有 ∑(v[j] for j in [a_i, a_{i+1}-1]) > ∑(v[j] for j in [a_{i+1}, a_{i+2}-1])
constraints.formal: ∀ 0 ≤ i < m-1, Σ(v[j] for j in [a_i, a_{i+1}-1]) > Σ(v[j] for j in [a_{i+1}, a_{i+2}-1])

constraints.name: lexicographical_maximization
constraints.description: 序列 a_m, a_{m-1}, ..., a_1 的字典序尽可能大
constraints.formal: maximize lexicographical order of (a_m, a_{m-1}, ..., a_1)
